Name: GameBreak
About the game: GameBreak is an Indie local multiplayer Mini Game Collection that contains 5 different games and requires 2 players to play the game. Players challenge and compete with each other in these 5 games. Each game has it's own mechanics and gameplay. You can challenge each other by surviving, racing, shooting or finishing a puzzle. Each game is designed to test the speed, creativity as well as patience of the player. The premise of the game is focused on Fun and local play that can be enjoyed with a partner, family member or a friend. Try and hit the player controlled pigeon in ' Hit The Pigeon ' Try To Munch on the other player in ' Shark Attack ' And other 5 in total fun games to compete in. Take a Break and Play.
